question: If an ordinary bill, originated and passed in the state legislative council of a bicameral states in India and state legislative assembly rejects the bill, then which among the following would follow?
option1: The bill will be sent back to state legislative council
option2: The bill will be sent to a joint committee of assembly members and council members
option3: The bill will be deemed deemed passed
explanation: When an ordinary bill, which has originated in the council and was sent to the assembly, is rejected by the assembly, the bill gets lapsed.
